pullRequest.title: Changes to help reduce the occurence of GEODE-8422

commit.message: Changes to help reduce the occurence of GEODE-8422
reversing a change to compare gcversions.

GEODE-8422: Adding unit test

- Added a unit test for the case where we don't want
to remove a tombstone with the region is not initialized.

nodes.bodyText: This method is empty and can be removed.

The creation and assignment of the mocks should be moved to the setUp() method to ensure that fresh mocks are created for each test method and hence prevent multiple tests acting on the same instance of a mock and producing unexpected results.

For these verifications, would it be reasonable to assert the specific number of invocations of getVersionVector() and recordGCVersion() we expect to see using Mockito.times(1) rather than just that it's at least one?
please include the standard apache copyright header
Does the comment above have to be updated?
